posts.entry: We talked about HTML components and how to make grid layouts with Flexbox in CSS.
I tried to have an element in my Flexbox layout also be another Flexbox layout. It hurt my brain. I hate Steve.
Today we started talking about scripts. It was a nightmare. I understand how loops work in theory but not in practice.
We discussed what a json server was and how to build one to act as a faux server for your data as you develop a site or app.
Today we learned how to create a new post with our site and add it to the database and then add it to the site.
I finally got the form to add posts to my database, add to the DOM, and actually clear the form!!
We added a like button to our giffygram project.
